feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-19T15:54:00.975728Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Postman 收购 Akita 以实现自动化 API 可观察性</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.postman.com/postman-acquires-akita-for-automated-api-observability/</id>; <updated>;2023 -07-19T15:19:07.447111Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.postman.com/postman-acquires-akita-for-automated-api-observability/"/>; <作者>; <name>;captn3m0</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=captn3m0</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://blog.postman.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Akita-Acquisition-Announcement-scaled.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：117px；" />;<br />;Postman 收购了 Akita，一家提供自动化 API 可观测性的公司。此次收购将为 Postman API 平台添加自动化 API 发现和监控功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#postman-acquires-akita-for-automated-api-observability" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787860" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;高级 Python 掌握</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.609954Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery"/>; <author>; <name>;a_bonobo</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=a_bonobo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/7201aa1c893c1ca8a9bf286374c1dc7330b4109b396d48382ef47ea77bd3f7de/dabeaz-course/python-mastery" style="width: 220 像素；高度：110 像素；" />;<br />;这是一门练习驱动的高级 Python 编程课程，十多年来在企业培训循环中经过了数百次实战测试。由 David Beazley 撰写，Python Cookbook 第三版 (O'Reilly) 和 Python Distilled (Addison-Wesley) 的作者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#advanced-python-mastery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785005" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;漫画代码：最令人讨厌的字体的等宽解释</stitle>; <id>;https://tosche.net/fonts/comic-code</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T14:51:07.615077Z</updated>; <link href="https://tosche.net/fonts/comic-code"/>; <author>; <name>;orphea</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycom binator.com/user?id=orphea</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Comic Code 是流行休闲字体 Comic Sans 的等宽改编版本，专为编程而设计。它从 Comic Sans 的友好特性和低分辨率易读性中汲取灵感，同时解决了其较差的轮廓和间距质量。该字体的目的是让代码看起来不那么令人生畏，包括对于有阅读障碍的读者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comic-code-monospaced-interpretation-of-the-most-over-hated-typeface" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787059" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;华硕将制造和销售英特尔的 NUC 产品</stitle>; <id>;https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/intel-nuc-systems-agreement.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T01:51:07.615791Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/intel-nuc-systems-agreement.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mepian</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mepian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/newsroom/featured/newsroom-tw tr-logo-rwd.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;英特尔和华硕已就制造、销售和支持下一代计算单元 (NUC) 系统产品线的条款清单达成一致。华硕将成立一个名为华硕 NUC BU 的新业务部门，以延续 NUC 系统产品线。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#asus-to-manufacture-and-sell-intels-nuc-products" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781248" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“没有出路”：视频游戏如何利用赌博技巧来吸引大手笔玩家</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jul/14/video-games-gambling-big-spenders</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T15:11:07.617818Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jul/14/video-games-gambling-big-spenders"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/e682fde3f587ba 2eb80544a91276b14ebbd4c4f2/0_176_4000_2400/master/4000.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;手机游戏与博彩业的融合日益明显，游戏开发商使用类似的技术来吸引和留住玩家。这些策略包括利用损失厌恶、价格锚定、社会证明、VIP计划、热点状态、虚假稀缺和宜家效应。目标是将免费游戏玩家转变为愿意花钱进行应用内购买的高级玩家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-way-out-how-video-games-use-tricks-from-gambling-to-attract-big-spenders" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787746" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;袋鼠肌腱可以更好、更强地重建人类膝盖</stitle>; <id>;https://lighthouse.mq.edu.au/article/july-2023/kangaroos-could-help-injured-athletes-get-back-in-the-game</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T12:51:07。 618917Z</更新>; <link href="https://lighthouse.mq.edu.au/article/july-2023/kangaroos-could-help-injured-athletes-get-back-in-the-game"/>; <作者>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lighthouse.618917Z</updated>; mq.edu.au/__data/assets/image/0008/1269422/knee-tile700x400.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚很快就会向世界提供一种独特、坚固、持久且易于使用的受损韧带替代品：袋鼠腱。袋鼠肌腱有可能成为比目前使用身体其他部位肌腱的重建方法更好的选择。它们的强度是人类肌腱的六倍，可以显着减少运动员的康复时间。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kangaroo-tendons-could-rebuild- human-knees-better-stronger" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784998" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;代码的 Iosevka 字体，来自代码</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/be5invis/Iosevka</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.619641Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/be5invis/Iosevka"/>; <author>; <name>;kuschkufan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kuschkufan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/be5invis/Iosevka/main/images/grand-title.light.svg#gh-light-mode-only" style="width: 220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;Iosevka 是一个开源、无衬线 + 粗衬线、等宽 + 准比例字体系列，专为编写代码、在终端中使用和准备技术文档而设计。它提供 6 个等宽子族和 2 个准比例子族，具有不同的权重、宽度和斜率。它支持多种字符，包括连接和特定于语言的连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#iosevka-typeface-for-code-from-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785409" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;Bookwyrm – 用于阅读书籍的联合社交网络</stitle>; <id>;https://joinbookwyrm.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.620459Z</updated>; <link href="https://joinbookwyrm.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;susanthenerd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =susanthenerd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joinbookwyrm.com/static/images/book-grid.png" style="width: 220px; height: 158px;" />;<br />;BookWyrm 是一个去中心化的社交网络，用于跟踪您的阅读情况、谈论书籍、撰写评论以及发现接下来要读什么。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bookwyrm-a-federated-social-network-for-reading-books" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785285" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Zig：即将发布的版本再推迟两周，并且缺乏异步功能</stitle>; <id>;https://ziglang.org/news/0.11.0-postponed-again/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T13:51:07.621255Z</updated>; <link href="https://ziglang.org/news/0.11.0 -postponed-again/"/>; <author>; <name>;manaskarekar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=manaskarekar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;即将发布的 Zig 0.11.0 版本原本应包括 async/await/suspend/resume，但已被推迟。该版本将侧重于改进代码库。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zig-upcoming-release-postponed-two-more-weeks-and-lacks-async-functions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36786294" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;很容易低估你的产品价格 (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://venturehacks.com/pricing</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T13:51:07.622094Z</updated>; <link href="https://venturehacks.com/pricing"/>; <author>; <name>;isp</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=isp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://149348552.v2.pressablecdn.com/wp-content/themes/Cutline-1-1.4-2ColumnRight/images/venture-hacks-logo-white.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;根据 Steve Blank 的说法，产品的正确价格可以是 0 美元或 100 万美元。他分享了一个关于一位名叫 Sandy Kurtzig 的女士的故事，她的软件定价为每年 75,000 美元，后来意识到她可以要求更多。史蒂夫强调不要低估产品价格的重要性，特别是如果您是一名工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#it-s-easy-to-underprice-your-product-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36776939" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jupyter+Git 问题现已解决（2022 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://nbdev.fast.ai/blog/posts/2022-08-25-jupyter-git/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T11:51:07.622878Z</updated>; <link href="https://nbdev.fast.ai/blog/post s/2022-08-25-jupyter-git/"/>; <author>; <name>;skadamat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skadamat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nbdev.fast.ai/blog/posts/2022-08-25-jupyter-git/friend-conflict.png" style="width: 220 px；高度：103px；" />;<br />;默认情况下，Jupyter 笔记本不支持 git。有了nbdev2，Jupyter+git的问题已经彻底解决了。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-jupyter-git-problem-is-now-solved-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lazygit：Git 命令的简单终端 UI</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T04:51:07.623559Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8456633/174470852-339b5011-5800-4bb9-a628-ff230aa8cd4e.png" style="width: 220px; height: 22 4像素；” />;<br />;Lazygit 是一个简单的 Git 命令终端 UI，旨在使 Git 更易于使用。它为交互式变基、暂存部分文件和切换分支等任务提供了一个用户友好的界面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lazygit-simple-terminal-ui-for-git-commands" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FiraCode：带有编程连字的免费等宽字体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T02:51:07.624895Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode"/>; <author>; <name>;Lwrless</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=Lwrless</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tonsky/FiraCode/master/extras/logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;Fira Code 是一种免费的等宽字体，包含用于常见编程多字符组合的连字。它有助于更​​快地阅读和理解代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#firacode-free-monospaced-font-with-programming-ligatures" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Netscape 和 Sun 宣布 JavaScript (1995)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20070916144913/https://wp.netscape.com/newsref/pr/newsrelease67.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T06:51:07.625583Z</updated>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070916144913/https://wp.netscape.com/newsref/pr/newsrelease67.html"/>; <author>; <name>;damethos</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=damethos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Netscape 和 Sun 宣布推出 JavaScript，这是一种用于企业网络和互联网的开放式跨平台对象脚本语言。 JavaScript 是对 Java 的补充，旨在创建将客户端和服务器上的对象和资源链接在一起的实时在线应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#netscape-and-sun-announce-javascript-1995" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782761" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;铁锈十年，并宣布二茂铁</stitle>; <id>;https://ferrous-systems.com/blog/a-decade-of-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.626264Z</updated>; <link href="https://ferrous-systems.com/blog/a-decade-of-rust/"/>; <author >; <name>;sbt567</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sbt567</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ferrous-systems.com/images/blog/bookcover_blog_post_announcement.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 307px;" />;<br />;这是 Florian 于 2013 年 9 月 28 日公开发布他的第一个 Rust 代码的 10 周年！并宣布发布我们为期 2 年的项目：Ferrocene。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-decade-of-rust-and-announcing-ferrocene" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785318" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本地异步执行器以及为什么它们应该是默认值</stitle>; <id>;https://maciej.codes/2022-06-09-local-async.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T07:51:07.627587Z</updated>; <link href="https://maciej.codes/2022-06-09- local-async.html"/>; <author>; <name>;rklaehn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rklaehn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://maciej.codes/maciej.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;编写聊天服务器是学习 Rust 异步编程的常见方法。然而，Rust 异步编程中默认的多线程方法可能会导致不必要的线程同步和复杂性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#local-async-executors-and-why-they-should-be-the-default" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Tachyons – CSS 工具包</stitle>; <id>;https://tachyons.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.629084Z</updated>; <link href="https://tachyons.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;impoppy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =impoppy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mrmrs/photos/gh-pages/tachyons/tachyons-theme.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;使用尽可能少的 CSS 创建快速加载、高度可读和 100% 响应式的界面。可以更改、扩展或更改模块以满足您的设计需求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tachyons-a-css-toolkit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;GPT-4 随着时间的推移变得越来越糟，而不是更好</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/svpino/status/1681614284613099520</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T14:51:07.629843Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/svpino/status/168161428461 3099520"/>; <author>; <name>;taytus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=taytus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpt-4-is-getting-worse-over-time-not-better" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36786407" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在西澳大利亚海滩发现太空物质</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/17/world/australia/mystery-object-australia-beach.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.630828Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com /2023/07/17/world/australia/mystery-object-australia-beach.html"/>; <author>; <name>;eigenhombre</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eigenhombre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/17/science/17xp-my steryobject1/17xp-mysteryobject1-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;在西澳大利亚的一个偏远海滩上发现了一个巨大的金属神秘物体，引发了对其起源的猜测。该物体看起来是金属的，至少有两米高，顶部悬挂着电缆或电线。虽然警方表示该物体是安全的，不会对公众构成风险，但他们仍在调查其来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#space-material-found-on-a-beach-in-western-australia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Neopets 会比以往更大、更好</stitle>; <id>;https://www.buzzfeed.com/haltherego/neopets-new-launch</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:51:07.632589Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.buzzfeed.com/haltherego/neopets-new-launch"/>; <author>; <名称>;thesuperbigfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thesuperbigfrog</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2023-07/19/2/asset/70b41689183e/sub-buzz-583-1689734008-1 .png?downsize=700%3A%2A&output-quality=auto&output-format=auto" style="宽度：220px；高度：167px；" />;<br />;Neopets 团队于 7 月 20 日推出新网站，宣布进入新时代。新主页将整合所有内容，让您更容易找到它们 — 从游戏到品牌公告、文章等。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neopets-is-coming-back-bigger-and-better-than-ever" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785450" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Highlight.io (YC W23) – 开源、全栈 Web 应用程序监控</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36774611</id>; <updated>;2023-07-18T16:51:07.634346Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36774611"/>; <author>; <name>;podoman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=podoman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Highlight.io 是一个用于现代 Web 应用程序的开源可观察性平台。它提供无缝连接的会话重放、错误监控和日志记录产品。该平台基于 OpenTelemetry、rrweb 和 ClickHouse 等开源项目构建。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-highlight-io-io-yc-w23-open-source-source-source-full-stack-web-app-monitoring" target="_blank">; [摘要] [摘要] </a>; K“>; [注释] </a>; </content>; </entry>; </feed>;
